briefTitle: Supermicrosurgery for Breast Cancer Survivors With Lymphedema.
officialTitle: Supermicrosurgery for Breast Cancer Survivors With Lymphedema. -Prospective Randomized Clinical and Patient-reported Outcomes.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Unilateral lymphedema of the arm secondary to breast cancer treatment. Stage 1-3 operable lymphedema.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Frequent or severe cellulitis. All other lymphedema.
